name: Whack A Virus! for Atari ST/E/TT/F030
name_original: Whack A Virus! for Atari ST/E/TT/F030
description:
Whack A Virus! is small whack a mole type of game for all 16/32bit Atari machines.

Can be started from hard disc or floppy ( ST image included ) On TT it run's in ST High mode, which is only available on VGA monitors. On Falcon it run's on VGA and real SM124 monitor.

 

  There are 3 files to download:

 whackem.zip     : ZIPed folder with Whack A Virus!

whackem.st        : Atari ST floppy disk image containing Whack A Virus!

whackemsteem : Steem Atari ST emulator preconfigured to run Whack A Virus!

  Enjoy, and lets fight Corona together! :)
